DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this trial was to compare two different uterotomy surgical techniques on the occurrence of a uterine niche and the risk of a number of short- and long-term gynecological complications associated with the presence and size of the niche.
DOC.brief_title: NIche Development With Closure of Cesarean Uterotomy by Modified or Conventional Two-layer Technique
DOC.criteria: Singleton pregnant Intended elective cesarean section Cervical dilatation of more than 4 cm Previous cesarean section
